We must not balance the budget at the expense of Vermonters struggling to heat their homes in winter, said Democratic Rep. Peter Welch .`` Instead of turning off the heat, we should be turning off the billions of dollars in subsidies we provide the oil industry.'' Patrick Leahy and Bernie Sanders echoed that sentiment.

There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, writes Donald Rumsfeld .
